snippet: A visa program for skilled workers has hit its quota just days into the application period, United States Citizenship and Immigration Services said.
abstract: United States Citizenship and Immigration Services says that visa program for skilled workers has hit its quota just days into application period, prompting lottery and signaling that companies feel confident enough to hire more foreign workers.
lead_paragraph: A visa program for skilled workers has hit its quota just days into the application period, United States Citizenship and Immigration Services said.

headline.main: Visa Program for Skilled Workers Hits Limit Early
headline.print_headline: Visa Program For Skilled Workers Hits Limit Early
